SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.gui.phases

Class GameGUIState

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.gui.phases.ClientGUIState
IS24_LB11.gui.phases.GameGUIState
public class GameGUIState extends ClientGUIState
The GameGUIState class manages the game phase in the GUI, handling player actions, game updates, and communication with the server.

    • update

      public void update(String currentPlayerTurn, ArrayList<Integer> playerScores, ArrayList<PlayableCard> normalDeck, ArrayList<PlayableCard> goldenDeck)
      Updates the game state with the current player's turn, player scores, and decks.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerTurn - the username of the current player's turn.
      playerScores - the scores of the players.
      normalDeck - the updated normal deck.
      goldenDeck - the updated golden deck.
